contents.name: README
contents.contents: Hi, I'm Rick Sullivan. I'm a student and programmer working as a Business and System Integration Analyst at Accenture. This summer, I am doing consulting work for Cisco in Milpitas, CA. Check out my Github account and resume or send me an email at rick@ricksullivan.net.

contents.name: alhambra.jpg
contents.caption: I spent fall quarter studying in Spain. I had the time of my life and met some awesome people. Here's the view from the Generalife above the Alhambra in Granada.

contents.name: Compilers
contents.description: See my coursework for my compilers class. I am writing a compiler for a subset of the C language.

contents.name: Too Many Friends
contents.description: In-progress Facebook friend remover. Suggests friends to remove by ranking friends based on how much you choose to interact with them.
